attributes.action: stop facebook allowing groups to be set up without any vetting on the names or name changes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: facebook currently allows public groups to be set up without any vetting on the names, or when they change the names or checks on the pictures they use, also when these sick horrible groups get reported, facebook either doesnt do anything or takes a very long time to take action! this needs to be changed, we need EVERY group thats created to be vetted, and any name changes that are requested for the groups also need to be vetted and agreed first!!! if they are any groups that are reported, facebook need to take appropriate action ASAP

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
